title: Game Crashing Randomly
body:
So it appears that ever since 4.11, LoL has been crashing on people after Champion select, usually in the game. I've had it crash on me multiple times for no apparent reason, and hitting Repair has done nothing to help!

Similar thread [Over HERE](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=48572115).

Please, PLEASE look into this, RITO.

replies.body:
Hey there, we've been seeing a lot of crashes due to Lol Replay this patch. Are you running that? If not, you should check out the Wrenchmen's tool box [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/na-support/IUfwqmE8-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-fixes).

If none of that resolves your issue, I recommend you submit a support ticket [here!](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new)

When you do that, Please make sure to attach the following information so that we're able to analyze what's happening a bit faster and hopefully get a quicker fix for you! 

1) First is the Direct X Diagnostic:
- https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980#wq5

2) r3d game logs from the games you are crashing in:
- https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980#wq7

3) Your process list:
- https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980#wq3

That... Actually did the trick...

Why can't solutions be more obvious? Thanks tho. :) Have a Teemo.

{{champion:17}}  Make sure it dies painfully.

Glad to hear it! Third party programs aren't supported by League of Legends so they run into issues with compatibility often. LolReplay runs into issues more often since it is affected by patches when files are updated. 

Good luck and enjoy your games! And you need to remember, Teemos are friends, not food.
Nonsense, Teemo is delicious with Ketchup.
